comments.text:
Created attachment 518252
sample

Env
===
Firefox 3.6
Firefox 4.0 latest without D2D/DW

Step
====
1. Open the following HTML

<html>
<head>
<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" CONTENT="text/html;charset=Shift_JIS">
<style>* {font-family: 'MS Gothic'; font-size: 14px;}</style>
</head>
<body>
<select>
<option value="" selected="selected"></option>
<option value="1">1</option>
<option value="2">2</option>
<option value="3">3</option>
<option value="4">4</option>
<option value="5">5</option>
<option value="6">6</option>
<option value="7">7</option>
</select>
</body>
</html>

2. click drop down box

Result
======
bottom line of drop down listbox isn't rendered.

Note
====
- If D2D is turned on, this problem doesn't occur.
- if font-size isn't 14px and font-family isn't MS Gothic or MS Minchyo, this problem doesn't occur.
comments.creator: m_kato@ga2.so-net.ne.jp
comments.author: m_kato@ga2.so-net.ne.jp
comments.raw_text:
Env
===
Firefox 3.6
Firefox 4.0 latest without D2D/DW

Step
====
1. Open the following HTML

<html>
<head>
<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" CONTENT="text/html;charset=Shift_JIS">
<style>* {font-family: 'MS Gothic'; font-size: 14px;}</style>
</head>
<body>
<select>
<option value="" selected="selected"></option>
<option value="1">1</option>
<option value="2">2</option>
<option value="3">3</option>
<option value="4">4</option>
<option value="5">5</option>
<option value="6">6</option>
<option value="7">7</option>
</select>
</body>
</html>

2. click drop down box

Result
======
bottom line of drop down listbox isn't rendered.

Note
====
- If D2D is turned on, this problem doesn't occur.
- if font-size isn't 14px and font-family isn't MS Gothic or MS Minchyo, this problem doesn't occur.

comments.creator: bzbarsky@mit.edu
comments.text: Is this a regression from 3.6?  If so, what's the range?
comments.author: bzbarsky@mit.edu
comments.raw_text: Is this a regression from 3.6?  If so, what's the range?

(In reply to comment #2)
> Is this a regression from 3.6?  If so, what's the range?

No. It occurs on 3.6 too.
